home.section1.title: Personal security, Re-imagined
home.section1.text: Using cutting edge technologies to keep you and your loved ones safe.
home.section1.dot1.title: Lita på knappen
home.section1.dot1.text: Din trygghet ligger i dina händer. Hjälpen är ett knapptryck bort.
home.section1.dot2.title: Din position delas
home.section1.dot2.text: Larmcentralen och dina anhöriga kan se och följa din position i realtid.
home.section1.dot3.title: Ditt ljud delas
home.section1.dot3.text: Larmcentralen och dina anhöriga kan höra dig och din omgivning i realtid.
home.section1.dot4.title: Historik
home.section1.dot4.text: Alla händelser sparas för evidens eller som analysverktyg, som bara du har tillgång till.
home.section1.dot5.title: Nära dig
home.section1.dot5.text: Få hjälp till trygghet utan att behöva     specificera var du befinner dig.
home.section1.dot6.title: Din data är din
home.section1.dot6.text: Du kan på ett tryggt och enkelt sätt granska, dela och radera din data.
home.section1.dot7.title: Innovation
home.section1.dot7.text: SoSafes teknologiska lösning är den första i världen att omdefinera trygghet.
home.videoSection.subTitle: Med {companyName} är du aldrig ensam. Din trygghet är vårt uppdrag. Med oss är du alltid SoSafe!
home.section2.card.safety.text: Assistance comes at your request. SoSafe does not evaluate your need for help and does not require you to specify your concerns.
home.section2.card.convenience.text: With the help of new technology, we update your personal security - anywhere, anytime.
home.section2.card.trust.text: Even if you do not know what you need, or even where you are, you can get help for security without delay.
home.section2.card.emergencyHelp.text: When you press SoSafe, the log is registered and saved for as long as you want. For evidence or as an analysis tool.
home.section2.card.contacts.text: Your selected security contacts are notified directly, as is the alarm center. They see position and hear you in real time.
home.section2.card.userExperience.text: SoSafe is a button - easy to use and carry. Becoming a SoSafe is super easy.
home.sliderSection.title: This is how {companyName} works
home.sliderSection.subTitle: Four simple steps to increased security
home.sliderSection.emergencyMessage.text: John Smith is in emergency click link below to see details:
home.section3.slide1.title: Press SoSafe!
home.section3.slide1.text: You do not need to use the phone, give your name or even be able to talk. Just press SoSafe!
home.section3.slide2.title: Your family is notified
home.section3.slide2.text: Your loved ones, people you have stated as your security contacts, and the alarm center, will be notified of your position and status.
home.section3.slide3.title: What has happened?
home.section3.slide3.text: Listening means that relatives and the alarm center hear in real time what is happening where you are. That way, they get an idea of what kind of help you need.
home.section3.slide4.title: Help is on the way
home.section3.slide4.text: SoSafe does not evaluate your need for help and does not require you to specify your need. Assistance comes when you need it.

emergencyInfo.secondComponent.h3: Vi? belevie in the power of technology. Click and in realtime sound and position is besing shared with you as Emergency contact and woth emergecny center.
